Class SourceDataResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.radarbase.management.web.rest.SourceDataResource

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/api")
public class SourceDataResource
extends java.lang.Object
    REST controller for managing SourceData.

      • createSourceData

        @PostMapping(value="/source-data")
 @Timed
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SourceDataDTO> createSourceData(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                          SourceDataDTO sourceDataDto)
                                                                                                                   throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                                                                                                          org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
        POST /source-data : Create a new sourceData.
        Parameters:
        sourceDataDto - the sourceDataDto to create
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 201 (Created) and with body the new sourceDataDto, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the sourceData has already an ID
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect
        org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException

      • updateSourceData

        @PutMapping(value="/source-data")
 @Timed
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SourceDataDTO> updateSourceData(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                         SourceDataDTO sourceDataDto)
                                                                                                                  throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                                                                                                         org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
        PUT /source-data : Updates an existing sourceData.
        Parameters:
        sourceDataDto - the sourceDataDto to update
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the updated sourceDataDto, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the sourceDataDto is not valid, or with status 500 (Internal Server Error) if the sourceDataDto couldnt be updated
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect
        org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException

      • getSourceData

        @GetMapping(value="/source-data/{sourceDataName:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}")
 @Timed
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SourceDataDTO> getSourceData(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                             java.lang.String sourceDataName)
                                                                                                                                                      throws org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
        GET /source-data/:sourceDataName : get the "sourceDataName" sourceData.
        Parameters:
        sourceDataName - the sourceDataName of the sourceDataDTO to retrieve
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the sourceDataDTO, or with status 404 (Not Found)

        org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
